title: The Ghost of Goh Seng Kiat
tagline: In a city where even the air is rented, a professional ghost for the rich finds the living are the ones trapped in an absurd performance.

chapters.title: A Fungal Infection of a Beard

story: Write a scene where a new 'Public Harmony' regulation mandates that all family meals must include a stranger from a different economic tier, observed through Lee's eyes during a Goh family dinner.

Draft the internal memo from the Ministry of Urban Harmony announcing a new policy: 'Emotional Space Rationing,' where displays of grief, joy, or frustration are taxed based on duration and decibel level.
Create a monologue from Old Mrs. Chua as she witnesses the balcony partitions being removed, weaving her story of the 'great flood' with the new 'volumetric equity.'
Write a job listing for Elysian Fields Memorials seeking a 'Posthumous Presence & Legacy Fulfillment Associate,' detailing the absurd qualifications and clauses.
technical: Build a 'Volumetric Equity Calculator' web tool where users input their apartment details and it calculates their air tax, social catwalk exposure score, and potential fines.
Design a speculative interface for Lee's 'ghost' work tablet, showing his schedule of performances, client scripts, and a real-time map of Ministry spatial realignments affecting his commute.

cover_prompt: A spectral figure in a tailored suit, Goh Seng Kiat, stands transparent and weary, holding a glowing ledger that lists the memories he is paid to haunt, [in the heart of a hyper-dense, rain-slicked Asian megacity where luxury skyscrapers are built directly over the crumbling, neon-lit shophouses of the past], in the atmospheric style of Simon St√•lenhag and Moebius, blending melancholic hyper-realism with surreal architectural detail, [book cover framing, centered composition looking up from a wet alley at the ghost who is both part of and separate from the oppressive cityscape], [cinematic chiaroscuro lighting with the cold, electric blues and neon pinks of the city below contrasting with the ghost's warm, melancholic golden aura], masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev. The scene captures the architectural class warfare: the ghost's form is pierced by the sleek lines of a billionaire's penthouse, while his feet dissolve into the vibrant, chaotic street market below. This is the commodification of memory and postcolonial absurdity; his performative identity is a service, and the living residents in the towering windows are blurred, anonymous performers in their own gold-plated cages. The composition is a vertical slice of societal strata, a haunting portrait of a professional ghost realizing he is the only free entity in a system where even the air is rented.
